stem: Given question: After being stuck indoors all day breathing fresh air would lead to what? and answer: feeling refreshed, explain why in
no_more_50_words: Being stuck indoors all day, e.g., at an office, tends to make people feel stuffy. This stuffy feeling can be reduced by going outside for refreshing, fresh air.
50_to_100_words: Breathing fresh air can have a number of benefits for our overall well-being. One major benefit is that it can help to increase the amount of oxygen in the body, which can lead to a feeling of increased energy and vitality. Additionally, fresh air can also help to clear out any pollutants or other harmful substances that may have built up inside the body, which can help to improve overall respiratory function. Furthermore, being outdoors in nature has also been linked with decrease stress levels and overall improvement in mental health. As a result, spending time outdoors in fresh air can lead to a feeling of refreshment and rejuvenation.
